Reviews.Title: “Good Location”
Reviews.Author: Emily P
Reviews.Content: stayed separate trips rome value located near train station 20 minute walk coliseum breakfast basic near restaurants fairly safe neighborhood stays own separate bathroom clean quiet highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Was less than I spected.”

Reviews.Content: november 2011 trip europe city visit rome surprised arrived hotel hall stairs handicap access fourth floor shared building additional hotels offices forget bell service carry own luggage stairs half floor elevator fourth floor looked hospital converted hotel smoked stairways smell smoke hard mattress luck army bunk softer continental breakfast fine hotels trough europe bathroom clean internet available lobby descent speeds

Reviews.Title: “A good stay in Rome with our kid in November”
Reviews.Author: Guillaume F
Reviews.Content: wife spent 4 nights argentina november 2011 enjoyed booked triple clean spacious spacious bathroom 10 kid enjoyed breakfast ok fabulous city break location ideal walk coliseum pantheon del popolo close st jean de direct access train station asset recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Old building, hotel on just a floor!!”

Reviews.Content: positive hotel location location mean nice central termini station 3 min foot hotel 4th floor dated building breakfast 5 dark noisy clean bathroom surely spacy looking backyard building dark clean funny bad smell coming toilet price single 82 euros related quality dark hotel ps positive mind afternoon shift receptionist

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel for a small family on a budget.”

Reviews.Content: husband travelled found hotel internet pleased rated hotel extremely clean fantastic location sight walk rome train station literally 710min walk bathroom facilities recommend family cot facilities seen email hotel wonderful answer questions dissapointed airconditioning day sightseeing heat arrived poor aircon days air consistant 106 2 single bedsbut tiny air con system fantastic breakfast average staff manager extremely helpful overall hotel family budget

Reviews.Content: budget traveller rome hotel argentina hotel situated 5 minutes walking distance central termini staff helpful welcomes smile entered expected comfortable bed lcd tv air conditioner mini bar furnished bathroom morning breakfast fresh products service hotel middle rome evening lot pizzeria bars streets viale nazionale 5 10 minutes walking distance unique view looking court doing dark dont rome stay watch view definitelly recommend hotel budget travellers disapointed expect 5 stars 3 stars hotel correct
